sen.e: He respected dynastic culture and was under the patronage of the Emperor Gomizu-no-o, and Ieyasu TOKUGAWA's real intention may have been to relocate Koetsu, because of his close ties with the Imperial Court, to a place as far away from Kyoto as possible.
